text: Neustadt an der Waldnaab is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The district is located in the mountains of the Upper Palatine Forest. == Towns and municipalities == Towns Municipalities # Eschenbach in der Oberpfalz # Grafenwöhr # Neustadt am Kulm # Neustadt an der Waldnaab # Pleystein # Pressath # Vohenstrauß # Windischeschenbach # Altenstadt an der Waldnaab # Bechtsrieth # Eslarn # Etzenricht # Floß # Flossenbürg # Georgenberg # Irchenrieth # Kirchendemenreuth # Kirchenthumbach # Kohlberg # Leuchtenberg # Luhe-Wildenau # Mantel # Moosbach 16.
